name: Fried Green Olives Stuffed with Blue Cheese
source_file: Fried Green Olives Stuffed with Blue Cheese.txt
description: Crispy fried olives stuffed with mild blue cheese - a perfect appetizer.
ingredients: 1 ounce mild blue cheese (such as Maytag)
instructions: Roll small amount of cheese into log shape narrow enough to stuff into 1 pitted olive; stuff olive with cheese. Repeat with remaining olives and cheese. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and chill.)
Pour enough oil into heavy large skillet to measure depth of 1 inch. Heat oil to 350Â°F.
Roll stuffed olives in flour, then in egg, then in breadcrumbs to coat.
Fry olives until golden brown, about 30 seconds.
Using slotted spoon, transfer olives to paper towels to drain. Serve hot.
notes: Make ahead: Stuffed olives can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and chill.
What to drink: A glass of bubbly would be perfect with the olives. Try Domaine Chandon Brut Classic.
